name: Angular Assault
description:
Created for the GoGodotJam 2
GODOT 3.4

[ THEME ]
Energy Source

[ OBJECTIVE ]
Destroy the alien Energy Source.
Place mirrors to direct the laser blast to the alien Energy Source and destroy it.

[ CAUTION ]
YOUR ENERGY SOURCE CAN RUN OUT!
YOU HAVE A LIMITED NUMBER OF ROTATIONS ON YOUR MIRRORS!

[ MOVEMENT ]
Press the E key on your keyboard to place the mirror
Press the R key while holding down the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to rotate the mirror
Hold the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to drag the mirror to a new location
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot your laser
SPACEBAR to reload the level
ESCAPE to pause the game

[ NOTE ]
NOT TESTED ON MAC AND LINUX. IF SOMEONE CAN LET ME KNOW IT WOULD BE APPRECIATED.

I had so much fun making this game, so the hope is to add more levels in the future! So keep watching this space!
